advancedchatfilters.config.filtermenu.in:
This filter needs to be installed. Installing it will allow the code to run.
§lEnsure there is no malicious code before installing this.
advancedchatfilters.warning.advancedfilt:
AdvancedFilters are currently §cdisabled§r
§lOnly enable if you know what you're doing and always check code before adding. 
§c§lMalicious code could be run§r

To enable close the game and open up the §7advancedchatfilters.json§r 
in §7~/minecraft/config/advancedchat/§r and set §7advanced_filters_on§r to §7true§r.
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.name: Filter Name
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.n:
What the filter shows up as §6in the config§r
 §7§bIt is good practice to name your filters meaningfully!
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.f: The string that will be §6searached§r and §6filtered§r

How matches will be found
§6Literal §r- Matches §6exactly §rthe string
§eUpper-Lower §r- Like §6Literal, §rbut not §6case-sensitive
§bRegEx §r - Parses the string as a §6regular expression
§dAll §r- Passes §6all §rtext through the filter, regardless of the string to find. This option is mainly used if you want to use a parent filter soley for grouping several child filters
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.s:
Whether or not this filter with account for the color the §6matched string§r. 
 With this value set to §atrue§r, the string "§bHello" will be interpreted as "Hello"
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.r:
The string that §6replaces §rwhat is set for §6replace type §r
§b%MATCH%§r is replaced by whatever §6triggered§r the filter

How the filter should replace the matched message 
§cNone §r - Replaces §6nothing
§aFull Message §r- Replaces the full message with the §6replace to§r string
§eOnly Match §r- Replaces only what §6triggered §rthe filter§r
advancedchatfilters.config.processor.inf: Whether or not messages caught by the filter are sent to the §aChat Box§r
Whether or not messages caught by the filter are sent to the §eAction Bar§r
Whether or not messages caught by the filter §6play a §dsound
Whether or not messages caught by the filter are §6spoken using the §bnarrator
advancedchatfilters.config.processor.nar:
What the §bnarrator§r will say when the §6filter is triggered
§6$1§r is used to represent the message caught by the filter
advancedchatfilters.config.processor.inf: Runs a §6Konstruct Script§r. More info on the Wiki.
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.t:
The color of the §6replaced text§r when the filter is triggered 
§7This setting gets overridden by §6legacy formatting codes§7!
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.r: Whether or not the §6custom text color§r should be used when the filter is triggered
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.b:
The color of the §6background§r when the filter is triggered 
§7This setting gets overridden by §6legacy formatting codes§7!
advancedchatfilters.config.filter.info.r: Whether or not the §6background§r should be replaced when the filter is triggered
advancedchatfilters.config.sound.info.so: How §6loud or quiet§r the notification sound is. Equivalent to the §6volume§r argument when using /playsound
How §6high or low§r the notification sound is. Equivalent to the §6pitch§r argument when using /playsound
advancedchatfilters.config.sound.info.no: The sound that plays §6when the filter is triggered§r
